title: Burnham Sterling and Company
text:
Burnham Sterling & Company is an aircraft consulting and advisory practice led by former senior members of <a href="Babcock%20%26amp%3B%20Brown">Babcock & Brown</a>. The traditional aircraft advisory activities formerly offered by Babcock are now offered by Burnham Sterling and continue to be led by former Babcock partner, Michael Dickey Morgan. Burnham Sterling operates its aircraft advisory practice from Babcock’s former offices in <a href="Cos%20Cob">Cos Cob</a>, Connecticut. The company is headed by Michael Dickey Morgan, 20 years at Babcock & Brown, most recently at head of the aircraft advisory business.

On October 10, 2012, Burnham Sterling & Company (BSC) was retained by <a href="Scandinavian%20Airlines%20System">Scandinavian Airlines System</a> (SAS) for the sourcing of 5 additional <a href="Airbus%20A320">Airbus A320</a>s. In 2011 BSC had successfully completed a similar exercise for 10 A320 aircraft for SAS.
